post:
**Happy New Year's Eve & New Year's from Dedispec - here a few last minute offers for anyone that is interested. Enjoy :)**  
  
<br />  
**Intel Xeon E3-1230v2 - Offer Valid through January 2nd 2019**  
16GB RAM  
1x 4TB HDD or 1x 480GB SSD (Can request 2x 2TB HDD or 2x 240GB SSD in the order notes)  
1Gbit Port: 100TB/Month  
Missouri (USA)  
***Note, this configuration only has 2 drive bays, so please ignore the order form showing 4.**  
    
$49/Month - Coupon: 2019NYE3  
  
**[Order Now!](https://www.dedispec.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=235)**  
<br />  
**Dual Intel Xeon E5-2670v2 - Offer Valid through January 2nd 2019**  
64GB RAM  
1x 4TB HDD or 1x 480GB SSD (Can request 2x 2TB HDD or 2x 240GB SSD in the order notes)  
1Gbit Port: 100TB/Month  
Missouri (USA)  
  
$69/Month - Coupon: 2019NYE5  
  
  
**[Order Now!](https://www.dedispec.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=343)**  
<br />  
**$10 Free Credit For New & Existing Customers - Offer Valid through January 1st 2019:**  
  
Beginning tonight and through all of tomorrow (1/1/2019), all new and existing customers can receive $10 account credit for free.  
  
New customers can't use it on the initial order, but may use it on their renewal (2nd month) payment. Existing customers may use it on any upcoming invoice. New customers can use this offer with ANY order, not just the above ones.  
  
**New Customers:** Include "**$10CREDIT2019**" in the order notes to have it added to your account.
**Existing Customers:** Open a ticket with our sales department and simply request the $10 free account credit.  
  
Reminder - This ends at 11:59:59 PM CST on January 1st 2019. There will not being any honored after that.
